AccountEndpoint.description:
A 'System.Uri' referencing the Azure Cosmos DB Endpoint.
This is likely to be similar to "https://{account_name}.queue.core.windows.net".

ConnectionString.description: Gets or sets the connection string of the Azure Cosmos database to connect to.

DisableTracing.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry tracing is disabled or not.

Cosmos.description: The settings relevant to accessing Azure Cosmos DB.
